node.title: VNV Nation – Illusion
node.excerpt: This song is performed by VNV Nation and appears on the album Judgement (2007), My dear sister was first one that suggested this beautiful song and after that, it became one of my favorite song that i have ever listened. Here you are this sing with lyrics. I hope you an enjoying time with that.
